short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances YouTube playlists with large, easy-to-use buttons for improved accessibility.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YTA - YouTube Accessible Playlist Buttons is a lightweight and user-friendly Chrome extension designed to improve the accessibility of YouTube playlists. By adding large, easy-to-use buttons, this extension makes navigating through playlists simpler and more intuitive, especially for individuals with disabilities or those who prefer a more ergonomic browsing experience.

Whether you have motor impairments, visual challenges, or simply want a more comfortable way to control your playlists, YTA ensures that everyone can enjoy their favorite content on YouTube with ease. Experience smoother playlist management with buttons that are not only more prominent but also positioned for maximum convenience.

Perfect for anyone seeking enhanced accessibility or looking to make their YouTube experience more inclusive, YTA - YouTube Accessible Playlist Buttons is a must-have tool for better, more accessible video watching.
